intension: Create an Instagram advertisement for a handmade blue knitted blanket for sale. Encourage customers to order online with a 25% discount. The store sells various textiles and knitwear items.
globalcaption: The image features a large, blue, handmade blanket with a soft and fluffy texture. The blanket is displayed prominently in the foreground, covering most of the frame. The background is a soft blue color, which complements the vibrant hue of the blanket. The overall scene is visually appealing and showcases the blanket as the main focus.
keywords: textile, wool, knit, thread, handmade, craft, blanket, blue, sale, ad, instagram, ig, insta, advertisement, tb

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a large, blue, handmade blanket with a soft and fluffy texture. The blanket is folded and draped over a white background, creating a striking contrast between the two colors. The blanket appears to be a knitted or crocheted piece, showcasing the craftsmanship and attention to detail in its creation

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a large, blue, fluffy towel that is folded in half. The towel is placed on a white background, making it the main focus of the scene. The towel's texture and color create a visually appealing contrast against the white background

body.text: Order online to get discount 25% off
